### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Code implements specification
- [ ] Type hints on all public APIs
- [ ] Google-style docstrings
- [ ] All tests pass
- [ ] 80%+ code coverage
- [ ] Code follows style guide (Black, isort)
- [ ] No new warnings

### Testing Requirements
- [ ] Unit tests written
- [ ] Integration tests (if applicable)
- [ ] Edge cases covered
- [ ] Error handling tested
